title: Amazon Prime Clone
description: This project is a simple HTML and CSS implementation of a Amazon Prime website clone. It aims to replicate the basic structure and styling of the popular entertaining website Amazon Prime.This project Showcases the power of HTML and CSS.

title: MakeMyTrip website clone
description: This project is a simple HTML and CSS implementation of a MakeMyTrip website clone. It aims to replicate the basic structure and styling of the popular travel booking platform. This project serves as a practice exercise for HTML and CSS skills.

title: Biography Mahatma Gandhi
description: This project is a webpage which can tell you the history of Mahatma Gandhi in a concised way from their birth to death.
